humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there is metastatic carcinoma in one out of the three sentinel lymph nodes examined (1/3). Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1, as per the AJCC staging system.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in one out of one sentinel lymph node (1/1) examined, which indicates a pathologic N1 stage. The other nodes examined were negative for carcinoma. The substaging information is not relevant to determining the N stage in this case.
